item.title: Configuring Achievements Section
item.description: Warning: New breaking changes has been introduced in the master. This guide is now outdated. It will be updated soon. Now, your site configuration files should be in data/sections directory and should follow this format. The Achievements section has been designed to showcase your achievements in a gallery view. This post will show how to configure the Achievements section of your site. At first, create an achievements.yaml file in the data directory of your site.
